body:
The current collection of Bioconductor packages tend to have scattered
dependencies and missing versions. Many have not been updated to the newest release making them incompatible with R >= 3.6. This commit replaces git-based
packages with tool-generated Spack package recipes with correct
dependencies and descriptions in place.

The new packages here have all available versions summed from Bioconductor releases 3.5, 3.6, 3.7, 3.8, and 3.9.

The generated packages do not contain any extra required logic for building the package; this will require manual review and testing.
Most non-git based Bioconductor packages (EG r-genomeinfodbdata) and some other CRAN packages will need to be updated before this is merged.

I'm currently working on installing each package to find any problems.
title: Replace git-based Bioconductor R packages
